org.sindice.siren.qparser.json.dsl

Class BooleanQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sindice.siren.qparser.json.dsl.AbstractQuery
      • org.sindice.siren.qparser.json.dsl.BooleanQuery

  • public class BooleanQuery
extends AbstractQuery
    Class that represents a boolean query object of the JSON query syntax.

      • with

        public BooleanQuery with(AbstractNodeQuery node)
        Adds a boolean clause with a BooleanClause.Occur.MUST operator.

        Use this method for clauses that must appear in the matching documents.

        See Also:
        org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanClause.Occur#MUST}

      • without

        public BooleanQuery without(AbstractNodeQuery node)
        Adds a boolean clause with a BooleanClause.Occur.MUST_NOT operator.

        Use this method for clauses that must not appear in the matching documents.

        See Also:
        org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanClause.Occur#MUST}

      • optional

        public BooleanQuery optional(AbstractNodeQuery node)
        Adds a boolean clause with a BooleanClause.Occur.SHOULD operator.

        Use this method for clauses that should appear in the matching documents.

        See Also:
        org.apache.lucene.search.BooleanClause.Occur#SHOULD}
